The EDB ODBC Connector provides connectivity between EDB Postgres Advanced Server (Advanced Server) and ODBC-compliant applications.

New features, enhancements, bug fixes, and other changes in the EDB ODBC Connector `12.02.0000.02` include:

| Type              | Description                                   |
| ----------------- | --------------------------------------------- | 
| Enhancement       | Support for EDB Postgres Advanced Server 13.  |
| Enhancement       | Support for Ubuntu 20.04 LTS platform.        |
